title: Some Palestinians Move Into Caves to Resist Israeli Expulsion
description: Israel’s Supreme Court has ordered the removal of about 1,200 Palestinians from their villages in the occupied West Bank. The United Nations says that could amount to a war crime.
dc:creator: Raja Abdulrahim
category: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
media:credit: Samar Hazboun for The New York Times
media:description: Members of the Abu Sabha family in July in a cave in Khirbet al-Fakheit, a village in the West Bank. The family’s home was destroyed three times, so they turned to the cave.
